definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
to look distracted/to stare blankly/distracted/blank/(coll.) unexpectedly/rash/rashly

sentences.english: But Sucre sits dazed and apologizes.
sentences.chinese: 但是坐着發愣的Sucre只是道歉。

sentences.english: She put out her foot and looked at her shoe reflectively .
sentences.chinese: 她伸出一隻腳，看着她的鞋子發愣。

sentences.english: Crowds of onlookers came to gawp at the wreckage of the aircraft.
sentences.chinese: 來看熱鬧的人，望着失事飛機的殘骸發愣。

sentences.english: If you give fortune cookies to the Chinese, they are utterly perplexed.
sentences.chinese: 如果你給中國人幸運餅，他們則會發愣。

sentences.english: Absence of mind is altogether an involuntary thing.
sentences.chinese: 發愣是完全出自無意識了。

sentences.english: The fool stared, with a grin hovering about his lips.
sentences.chinese: 那個傻子瞪着眼發愣，嘴上掛着癡笑。
